about_the_game:
Paper Needs Inspiration! is a survival resource management game where you play as Paper, a writer who needs new ideas for his work. To help Paper find his muse, the player must explore the world and find his reason for being there, thereby discovering a fresh artistic direction for his writings.



Collecting resources in the world is an essential part of your journey. Learn to craft tools, then use them to farm the items that will help you in your journey.



There are many useful objects and structures to learn and build. They will help you survive the world as well as aid you in your progress towards finding your inspiration.






The world is procedurally generated and goes on forever and ever, with many unexpected things to encounter, so choose a direction and go exploring!



Some animals you meet just won’t like you. That’s the time to put up a fight and show them who is in charge!






  • Brilliant HD visual presentation and sound
  • Abstract and bizarre beings to meet
  • Engage in interesting activities to survive
  • Dozens of items to learn and construct
  • Procedurally generated terrain, explore it forever
  • Unique hub worlds to visit
  • Existential main story

There are many useful objects and structures to learn and build. They will help you survive the world as well as aid you in your progress towards finding your inspiration.






The world is procedurally generated and goes on forever and ever, with many unexpected things to encounter, so choose a direction and go exploring!



Some animals you meet just won’t like you. That’s the time to put up a fight and show them who is in charge!

name: Paper Needs Inspiration! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio or better

short_description: The world is a big place and there is much to do. As Paper, an uninspired writer, you will discover the world and its many inhabitants! There is much to find and uncover.
